trans-unit.source: Represents an element that has a value within a specific range.
trans-unit.target: Egy elem, amely rendelkezik egy adott tartományon belüli értéket jelöli.

trans-unit.source: A RangeBase control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> that can be set between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egy RangeBase vezérlőnek egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>, amelyek között állítható be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RangeBase visually indicates its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A RangeBase vizuálisan azt jelzi, hogy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the user can interactively set the value; in other cases, the value can be set only programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Néhány esetben a felhasználó interaktív beállíthatja a; más esetekben az érték csak programozott módon állítható be.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: A felhasználó beállíthatja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, de nem a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a hozzáadott vagy a program levonja az értéket a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>, egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő származó <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>határozza meg, hogyan ezzel a tulajdonsággal.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: Amikor a felhasználó kattint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>, egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>tulajdonság növeli vagy csökkenti a LargeChange értékének.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> commands on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: Amikor a felhasználó meghívja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>vagy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A>parancsai egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty>a csúszka változásainak LargeChange értékével.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>nem használja ezt a tulajdonságot.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> to add to or subtract from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: <>*> hozzáadása vagy értékekből kivonni a <> </> *>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> elemet.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték az 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Azonosítja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the highest possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a lehető legmagasabb <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>tartomány elem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>Ennek a tulajdonságnak metaadatait írja felül, és beállítja az alapértelmezett 10-re.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>Ennek a tulajdonságnak metaadatait írja felül, és az alapértelmezett 100 állítja.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> to provide a new <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> function.

trans-unit.source: When overriding OnValueChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s OnValueChanged method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of SmallChange.
trans-unit.target: Amikor a felhasználó kattint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>, egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>tulajdonság növeli vagy csökkenti a SmallChange értékének.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: Provides a string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Karakteres biztosít egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that provides the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer értékeinek biztosító karakterláncot ad vissza a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc alakot adja vissza egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a tartomány vezérlő aktuális nagyságrenddel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control visually indicates the Value property in some way.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>vezérlő vizuálisan jelzi a Value tulajdonság valamilyen módon.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the Value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A csúszka és görgetősáv vezérlők például egy USB, amely szinkronizálva van a vezérlő értékének rendelkezik.

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a szám érték kisebb, mint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>tulajdonság értéke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> Ez

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ha érték egy szám, amely nagyobb, mint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>tulajdonság értéke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: A tartomány vezérlő aktuális mértékét.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték a 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the range value changes.
trans-unit.target: A tartomány értékének megváltozásakor következik be.
